description.value: The ra.submit-data operation is used by providers to submit clinical evaluation evidence to payers for risk adjustment purpose.

comment.value: The effect of invoking this operation is that the submitted data is posted to the receiving system and can be used for subsequent evaluation of coding gaps. The clinical evaluation evidence may be a patient's C-CDA document.

documentation.value: The relevant [Risk Adjustment Coding Gap MeasureReport](StructureDefinition-ra-measurereport.html) received from the Payer that the clinical evaluation evidence is being submitted for by the Provider.
The clinical evaluation evidence being submitted.
